summary: This is an FBI FD-302 interview report documenting an interview with inmate Steven Lopez at the Manhattan Correctional Center (MCC) on August 20, 2019. Lopez, who worked as a garbage collector and orderly, was questioned about a tip alleging a cover-up involving the shredding of sensitive documents related to inmate Jeffrey Epstein. Lopez denied any knowledge or involvement.

keyFacts: Inmate Steven Lopez was interviewed on August 20, 2019, about a tip alleging a cover-up involving the shredding of documents related to Jeffrey Epstein at the MCC.
Lopez, who worked collecting garbage and as an orderly, denied any knowledge of document shredding or any cover-up.
Lopez stated he observed 'a little more shredded trash than usual, maybe 2 days more,' but had no specific information linking it to Epstein.
The interview was conducted as part of FBI investigation file #90A-NY-3151227.
